_comment: Extrinsics place the user and device in the coordinate system of the scene.
Value of top-level 'requires grad' key indicates whether user and device extrinsics are assumed to be differentiable.
name: default scene

user._comment: Path is the directory where the camera file is found. If null, the SEET default is used.

device._comment: Path is the directory where the device file is found. If null, the SEET default is used.
